s: Cat's Pride: No company is more passionate about cats and litter than Cat’s Pride.

Formulated from our naturally lightweight minerals, our lightweight litter is 40% lighter than traditional scoopable litters. That means it’s easier to lift, carry, and pour – so you can take a load off. When things get heavy, lighten your life with Cat’s Pride® litter.
